thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 11 of 97
thread.title: Michelle W.

author: Michelle W.
title: Michelle W.
text:
Biblio had the lowest price for the particular book I purchased.
The order processing and shipping were both quite a bit slower than with other vendors, but the book (in perfect condition) eventually arrived on the very last day of the specified arrival period - so, reliable if slow. Will certainly shop Biblio again if that's where I can get the best price !
